about_the_game:
An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD GRAPHICS and realistic-looking characters.
The story concludes in grand style as Tony, his two assistants, and his business partner Gavin set sail on a luxurious yacht to celebrate their success. The yacht becomes a haven of pleasure as they indulge in each other’s bodies under the warm sun.

GAME DESCRIPTION

Meet Tony and embark on his wild Sex Adventure as he rediscovers life as a single guy.

EPISODE 9

The papers have been signed, and Tony has finally gotten the office building of his dreams to expand his beloved company. This calls for a celebration in style, so Tony, his two assistants, and his business partner Gavin set sail on a luxurious yacht.
As they cruise through the calm, blue waters of the Caribbean, Gavin remembers his hot encounter with Kyle and admits he would like to have him again. Not one to be selfish, Tony encourages him to explore his interest, assuring him that Henry will keep him entertained.
The yacht becomes a haven of pleasure as they embrace the freedom of the sea and indulge in the two assistant’s sexy bodies under the warm sun.
Tony’s Sex Adventure reaches its grand finale, leaving the group with memories to cherish forever.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Contains gay sex scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
